content:
Is there code for the sums and products of linear orders as well as other facts about the arithmetic of linear orders?

Also, if there has been any significant result about linear orders written I would be curious to read and so would appreciate being pointed towards it (i haven't found anything).

Ah thank you, that is what I was looking for!

Is there some documentation explaining the organization of mathlib? I would have never thought to look in Data.
Not really, but you can always ask me! One day I will write folder documentation.
Also note that you could have found this by looking at the list of instances of docs#LinearOrder
Great, and thanks for pointing me to the list of instances!
Eric has marked this topic as resolved.
